entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet CLI commands from Wine within Azure agent job no longer work in .NET 7/8 #38613

Closed

  • add output format support for dotnet tool list command #37239
    Backlog
  • PublishSingleFile=true does not work correctly in a multi project build #3925
  • Unified Build control update #27562

PullRequests

Created

  • backport: Verbosity Options default to minimal from quiet in tool install #38612
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Make the use of the Roslyn toolset package an opt-in #38568
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Define RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath in outer-build #38185
    Servicing-approved, Area-NetSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2372344 #38207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add tool list format option #37394
    Approved to merge, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Tools
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` in `tool install` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • DotNetOrchestrator->DotNetBuildOrchestrator #38606
    untriaged, Area-FSharp
  • Remove high priority message from test target #38573
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to Unified Build controls #38506
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.117 #38578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.407 #38580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Update for loc #37985
    localization, Area-Infrastructure
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
